<TD STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; WIDTH: 8.53%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</DIV>

	Company Information Available on the Internet
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<EFX_PART_I>
<A NAME="FIS_PART_I"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	PART I
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.4PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A NAME="FORM10K_HTM_ITEM1">
<!--ANCHOR-->
</A>
	ITEM 1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.06PT" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	BUSINESS
</U>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	GSE&#160;Systems,&#160;Inc. ("GSE Systems", "GSE", the "Company", "we", "us" or "our"), a NYSE&#160;MKT company trading under symbol GVP, is a team of dedicated people that help customers meet their performance improvement goals and reduce their risk.&#160; We do this by combining expertise in simulation, engineering, and training to improve both plant and human performance.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We execute projects globally with over 260 employees operating from offices in the U.S., China, India, Sweden and the United Kingdom.&#160; While the majority of revenue comes from the nuclear and fossil power generation markets, we also serve the oil and gas, refining, chemicals, petrochemicals, industrial gas, manufacturing, and plant utilities markets.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	GSE&#160;Systems was formed on March&#160;30,&#160;1994, to consolidate the simulation and related businesses of S3&#160;Technologies, General&#160;Physics&#160;International&#160;Engineering&#160;&amp;&#160;Simulation and EuroSim, each separately owned and operated by ManTech&#160;International&#160;Corporation, GP&#160;Strategies&#160;Corporation and Vattenfall&#160;AB, respectively.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	On April&#160;26,&#160;2010, we completed the acquisition of TAS&#160;Holdings&#160;Ltd ("TAS") and subsequently merged TAS into our UK subsidiary, GSE&#160;Systems&#160;Ltd.&#160; Our UK operations, located in Stockton-On-Tees, England provides engineering consulting, specifically in electrical system design, instrumentation and controls engineering and automation engineering.&#160; The majority of our UK customers are in the petroleum refining, oil and gas, chemical and petrochemical industries.&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	On January&#160;4,&#160;2011, we acquired EnVision&#160;Systems,&#160;Inc. ("EnVision").&#160; The EnVision product line consists of interactive computer-based tutorials and related simulation models primarily for the petrochemical and oil &amp; gas refining industries.&#160; The EnVision products provide a foundation in process fundamentals and plant operations and interaction.&#160; We have more than 750 installations of EnVision product in over 28&#160;countries, and our approximately 130&#160;clients include Shell&#160;Oil&#160;Company, BP&#160;Products&#160;North&#160;America, Total and Chevron.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
	4
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage5"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	On November&#160;14,&#160;2014, we acquired Hyperspring,&#160;LLC, an Alabama limited liability company.&#160; Hyperspring is a staff augmentation company that hires personnel to fulfill staff positions on a short-term basis for energy industry customers, primarily nuclear power customers.&#160; Hyperspring personnel provide training, operations and maintenance support including:&#160; generic fundamentals exams ("GFES"), accreditation training visit ("ATV") preparation, senior reactor operator ("SRO") certification, procedure development, work management, tagging/labeling, outage execution, planning/scheduling, corrective action, self-assessments and equipment reliability.&#160; Customers include TVA, Entergy, PSEG&#160;Nuclear&#160;LLC and NRG&#160;Energy&#160;Inc.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In conjunction with the Hyperspring acquisition, the Company acquired a 50% ownership stake in IntelliQlik,&#160;LLC, a Delaware limited liability company.&#160; IntelliQlik is developing a software platform for online learning and learning management for the energy market.&#160; A former member of Hyperspring &#160;also has a 50% ownership stake in IntelliQlik.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	On December&#160;31,&#160;2014 the Company merged EnVision with GSE&#160;Power&#160;Systems,&#160;Inc. and changed the name of GSE&#160;Power&#160;Systems,&#160;Inc. to GSE&#160;Performance&#160;Solutions,&#160;Inc.&#160; The change reflects our growing focus on providing solutions to improve human and plant performance lifecycles.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	For years we have described ourselves as a simulation company, providing mainly simulation solutions to improve designs, de-risk projects and train operators.&#160; Our acquisition of Hyperspring, and investment in IntelliQlik,&#160;LLC, in November 2014 are helping to accelerate our transformation into a performance improvement company.&#160; We improve plant performance with a combination of simulation, engineering and plant services that help clients improve their plant's profitability, productivity and safety, and assist in decommissioning the plants at the end of their life cycle.&#160; We improve human performance by providing technologies and services that systematically help clients in recruiting and selecting the right person for the job and training that individual throughout their career from entry-level to expert.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	As of December&#160;31,&#160;2015, GSE&#160;Systems was the parent company of:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="89D559963D6C498CBC4FDAB2D96DD0D1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>

</TD>

	&#168;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	GSE Performance Solutions, Inc. (formerly GSE&#160;Power&#160;Systems,&#160;Inc.), a Delaware corporation;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company has a 50% interest in IntelliQlik,&#160;LLC, a Delaware limited liability company and a 50% interest in General&#160;Simulation&#160;Engineering&#160;RUS&#160;LLC, a Russian closed joint-stock company.&#160; The Company accounts for these entities under the equity method of accounting.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
	5
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage6"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Operating Segments
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We operate through two reportable business segments:&#160; Performance Improvement Solutions and Nuclear Industry Training and Consulting.&#160; Each segment focuses on delivering solutions to customers within our targeted markets - primarily the power and process industries.&#160; Marketing and communications, accounting, finance, legal, human resources, information systems and other administrative services are organized at the corporate level.&#160; Business development and sales resources are generally aligned with each segment to support existing customer accounts and new customer development.&#160; Our two business segments are:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="E7E603830DA343DD928362DCE30BF688" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Performance Improvement Solutions (approximately 65% of revenue)
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Our Performance Improvement Solutions segment primarily encompasses our next generation power plant and process high-fidelity simulation solutions, as well as engineering solutions.&#160; This segment includes various simulation products, engineering services, and operation training systems delivered across the industries we serve: primarily nuclear and fossil fuel power generation, and the process industries.&#160; Our simulation solutions include the following: (1) simulation software and services, including operator training systems, for the nuclear power industry, (2) simulation software and services, including operator training systems, for the fossil power industry, (3) simulation software and services for the process industries used to teach fundamental industry processes and control systems to newly hired employees and for ongoing workforce development and training.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="2F7C2C9F2D1F490D9ADDCA14CA6DE67A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Nuclear Industry Training and Consulting (approximately 35% of revenue)
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Nuclear Industry Training and Consulting provides highly specialized and skilled nuclear operations instructors and other consultants to the nuclear power industry.&#160;&#160; These employees work at our clients' facilities under client direction.&#160; Examples of these highly skilled positions are senior reactor operations instructors, procedure writers, work management specialists, planners and training material developers.&#160; This business is managed through our Hyperspring subsidiary.&#160; The business model, management focus, margins and other factors clearly separate this business line from the rest of the GSE product and service portfolio.&#160; Hyperspring has been providing these services since 2005.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Financial information is provided in Note 16 of the accompanying consolidated financial statements regarding our business segments and geographic operations and revenue.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
	6
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Business Strategy, Industry Trends, Products, Services
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Business Strategy
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Our objective is to be the leading provider of software and technology-enabled services and know-how to the global power and process industries by capitalizing on near and long-term growth opportunities primarily in the nuclear industry.&#160; We will offer the same suite of products and services to adjacent markets such as fossil power and the process industries where our offerings are a natural fit with a clear and compelling value proposition for the market.&#160; Our primary growth strategy is twofold: (1) expand organically within our core markets by leveraging our market leadership position and drive increased usage and product adoption via new products and services, and (2) seek acquisitions to accelerate our overall growth.&#160; To accomplish this, we will pursue the following activities:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="917D377385BF489C97605E6F9928D96F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Expand our total addressable market.
</FONT>
	&#160; Our focus on growth means introducing product&#160; capabilities or new product categories that create value for our customers and therefore expand our total addressable market.&#160; Currently we are working on initiatives to expand our solution offerings in both our business units which may include, but not be limited to the following: expanding our software product portfolio to the industries we serve such as enhanced power and process simulation tools and systems that are complementary to our core offerings; delivering enhanced learning management systems/solutions; offering fully outsourced training solutions to our customers; adding work flow process improvement solutions; and tailoring operational reporting and business intelligence solutions to address the unique need of our end user markets.&#160; Initiatives such as these will broaden our scope and enable us to engage more deeply with the segments we serve.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="A639DE6E688B4B5DB15EE218FAA2E495" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Pursue strategic acquisitions opportunistically.
</FONT>
	&#160; We intend to complement our organic growth strategy through selective acquisitions of other software and service businesses, both domestic and international, which would enhance our existing portfolio of products, strengthen our relationships with our existing customers, and potentially expand our footprint to include new customers in our core served industries.&#160; We have made several small acquisitions in recent years and believe the opportunity exists to do more.&#160; For example, in January 2011 we acquired EnVision Systems Inc., which provided interactive multi-media tutorials and simulation models, primarily to the process industries.&#160; We have integrated the technology assets from this acquisition and expanded the firm's application to other industries, and we intend to repeat this successful process.&#160; We acquired Hyperspring in 2014, which enabled GSE to offer highly skilled nuclear operations and consulting know-how on site at a large segment of our client base on an operational basis providing essential services.&#160; This deepened our relationship with existing clients and won business for us at new client sites in the nuclear industry.&#160; This acquisition has proven to be very synergistic, including in 2015, for the first time, expanding these services internationally.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
	7
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage8"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="D3FC146DDECC4D95A61D05FFA54D3D9E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Continue to provide technology-enabled, market-leading solutions.&#160;
</FONT>
	We invest in R&amp;D in order to deliver unique solutions that add tremendous value to our end-user markets.&#160; Recently we have delivered nuclear core and balance of plant modeling and visualization systems to the industry.&#160; To address the nuclear industry's need for more accurate simulation of both normal and accident scenarios, we provide our DesignEP
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	TM
</SUP>
	and RELAP5-HD
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	&#174;
</SUP>
	solutions.&#160; Our entire JADE
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	TM
</SUP>
	suite of simulation software, including industry leading JTOPMERET
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	&#174;
</SUP>
	and JElectric
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	TM
</SUP>
	software, provides the most accurate simulation of Balance of Plant and electrical systems available to the nuclear and fossil plant simulation market.&#160; The significant enhancements we have made to our SimExec
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	&#174;
</SUP>
	and OpenSim
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	TM
</SUP>
	platforms enables customers to be more efficient in the daily operation of their simulators.&#160; We have both upgraded and expanded the EnVision library of simulation and eLearning tutorials for the process industries with specific new products for training clients in the upstream segment of the oil and gas industry.&#160; We continue to provide cutting edge training systems by adapting our technology to systems to meet the specific needs of customers such as U.S. government laboratories.&#160; Gross spending on software product development ("development") expenses totaled $3.1 million and $3.8 million for the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014, respectively.&#160; We intend to continue to make prudent investments in research and development ("R&amp;D") that first and foremost are driven by the market, and are complementary to advancing our growth strategy.&#160; Such investments in R&amp;D may result in on-going enhancement of existing solutions as well as the creation of new solutions to serve our target markets, ensuring that we add greater value, in an easier to use fashion, than any alternative available to customers and that we delight them in the process.&#160; GSE has pioneered a number of industry standards over our lifetime and will continue to be one of the most innovative companies in our industry.&#160; We have a recognized high-value brand as one of the most respected providers of software and services to the industry, as evidenced by our marquee client base and significant market wins over the past year.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="594208053D914325AC9BD9B6B581BAED" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Expand International Operations in Selected Markets.&#160;
</FONT>
	We believe there are additional opportunities for us to market our software and services to international customers, and do so in a cost effective manner.&#160; For example, we believe partnerships with Value Added Resellers ("VAR") could significantly expand our sales pipeline for the EnVision software suite.&#160; Such VARs may yield positive results for our pursuing international nuclear opportunities globally (see industry trends below).&#160; We may explore the creation of appropriate JVs to target nuclear new-build programs in key growth regions.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
	8
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage9"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Industry Trends
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Industry need for building and sustaining a highly skilled workforce
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We believe a critical ongoing challenge facing the industries we serve is access to and continued development of a highly trained and efficient workforce.&#160; This challenge manifests primarily in two ways: the increasing pace of the knowledge and experience lost as a significant percentage of the existing experienced workforce reaches retirement age over the next several years; and the fact that as new power plants come on-line, there is an increased demand for more workers to staff and operate those plants in addition to the plants in the existing fleet.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	According to Power Engineering magazine, in the United States every sector in the energy industry is expected to lose a large percentage of its workforce as baby boomers retire on the traditional schedule.&#160; The power sector alone will be forced to replace more than 100,000 skilled workers by 2018 simply to replace those retiring.&#160; The Nuclear Energy Institute estimates that 39% of the nuclear workforce will be eligible to retire by 2018.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Globally, as more people increase their standard of living, their demand for power will increase, which in turn will require the on-going construction of power plants to meet this surging demand.&#160; Developing a skilled labor force to operate these plants and keeping their skills current and their certifications in compliance with regulatory requirements is a key challenge facing the global power industry.&#160; Similar challenges face the process industries as well.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	An important emerging trend to note seems to be a growing recognition that nuclear energy is an increasingly desirable form of energy production fulfilling a key component of zero carbon initiatives across the globe.&#160; Support for generating power from zero carbon emissions sources is evidenced by initiatives such as the 2015 United Nations Climate Change Conference.&#160; Nuclear power generation is a critical means of zero carbon power generation that is growing in importance as a result.&#160; We believe that GSE is well positioned to take advantage of these trends as they emerge and develop.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Growing Global Power Demand and the Increasing Emphasis on Nuclear Power
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	World Energy Outlook 2015 projects that electricity demand increases by more than 70% over the 2013 to 2040 time period.&#160; At the same time, countries globally are pledging to reduce greenhouse gas emissions despite this growth in demand for power.&#160; These trends are increasingly favorable to nuclear power.&#160; The United Kingdom illustrates this trend, with a recently announced energy policy that places a much greater reliance on nuclear power and unveiled plans for a new nuclear fleet, while slashing subsidies for solar energy and an eye to phase out coal fired power plants.&#160; With plans to build at least three new nuclear plants, the UK plans to add 16GWe of new nuclear capacity operating by 2030 according to World Nuclear Association.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	There are currently 65 nuclear plants under construction in 15 countries, including 24 in China, nine in Russia, six in India and four in the United Arab Emirates according to the Nuclear Energy Institute.&#160; Five reactors are currently under construction in the U.S. including two for Southern Nuclear at the Vogtle site; two at SCANA's VC Summer site and one at the Tennessee Valley Authority's Watts Bar generating facility (which is planned for commercial production imminently).&#160; According to the World Nuclear Association, there are 165 reactors in 27 countries in specific phases of planning that will be operating by 2030.&#160; This pace of construction is surpassing peak construction velocity of the 1970's and 1980's.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In addition to new plants, generating more power through enhanced plant performance, especially reducing unplanned outage time, is a critical objective for the nuclear power industry to meet growing global electricity demand.&#160; Capacity factors, also known as load factors, have been greater than 90% in the U.S. in five of the seven years between 2007 and 2013.&#160; The U.S. is recognized as the leader in load factor performance.&#160; The U.S. accounts for nearly one third of the world's nuclear electricity, highlighting its importance as a market as well as its need for high levels of performance.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We believe GSE is well positioned to take full advantage of these strategic global and domestic trends through our providing high fidelity simulation and training solutions to the global power and process industries.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
	9
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage10"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Products and Services
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Entry2Expert
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	TM
</SUP>
	Performance Cycle
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	To assist our clients in creating world-class internal training and performance improvement programs, we are offering the Entry2Expert
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	TM
</SUP>
	Performance Solution, a set of integrated and scalable products and services which provide a structured program from employee selection and onboarding through continuous skills improvement for experienced employees.&#160; GSE can now provide the right training solution for the right step in each employee's career.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The major elements of the Entry2Expert
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	TM
</SUP>
	Performance Solution include defining specific training needs by analyzing job functions; following proven processes to structure the entire training program for clients;&#160; providing world-class training content and series of simulation solutions for both the new employee and most experienced workers; and providing the expert training staff and consultants to ensure this is all implemented effectively.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="86242F0FAF79467486F7461C4039E01E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Universal Training Simulators:&#160;
</FONT>
	These products complement the Self-Paced Training Tutorials by reinforcing what the student learned in the tutorial, putting it into practice on the Universal Simulator.&#160; The simulation models are high fidelity and engineering correct, but represent a typical plant or typical process, versus the exact replication of a client's plant.&#160; We have delivered over 250 such simulation models to clients consisting of major oil companies and educational institutions.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

</DIV>

</FONT>

<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="D1331B7083F94ACCB739C4E380C8414A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	Plant-Specific Operator Training Simulators:&#160;
</FONT>
	These simulators provide an exact replication of the plant control room and plant operations.&#160; They provide the highest level of realism and training and allow users to practice their own plant-specific procedures.&#160; Clients can safely practice startup, shutdown, normal operations, as well as response to abnormal events we all hope they never have to experience in real life.&#160; We have delivered nearly 450 plant-specific simulators to clients in the nuclear power, fossil power and process industries worldwide.

<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">

<DIV>

	All of these dimensions help to improve our customers' bottom lines
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The dramatic increase in energy demand world-wide over the next 30 years will require significant amounts of training for new employees and also will require new plants using energy of all sources.&#160;&#160; These new plants will need to be engineered and designed prior to construction, and GSE high-fidelity modeling tools are being used increasingly to verify and validate control system and overall plant designs.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">

	10
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage11"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Specialized Plant Support
</FONT>
	: As our customers' experienced staffs retire, access to experts that can help with specialized plant projects is critical.&#160; Through our Hyperspring subsidiary, we also can provide expert support either through staff augmentation or turnkey projects for the following:
</DIV>
<DIV>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Entry2Expert
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	TM
</SUP>
	("E2E") brings together the collection of skills GSE has amassed over more than 40 years beginning with its traditional roots in custom high fidelity simulation and training solutions for the power industries, extended through the acquisition of specialized engineering capabilities, enhanced by the entry and intermediate level training solutions of EnVision, and the extensive nuclear industry training and consulting services of Hyperspring.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
	11
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">

<A NAME="eolPage12"></A>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Customers and Locations
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	For more than 40 years, we have been developing next-generation, custom training simulation technologies.&#160; Since we built the first commercial full-scope nuclear power plant simulator in 1971, we have completed more than 1,100 installations in 50 countries and have built more full-scope power plant simulators than all of our competitors combined.&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In 2015, approximately 31% of our revenue was generated from end-users outside the United States.&#160; A small representative list of our customers include:&#160; ABB&#160;Inc., American Electric Power, Bechtel Hanford National Laboratory, Duke Energy, EDF Energy &#160;(United&#160;Kingdom), Emerson&#160; Process&#160; Management, Exelon, K&#228;rnkrafts&#228;kerhet och&#160;Utbildning&#160;AB&#160;(Sweden), Korean Electric Power Company (Korea), PSEG&#160;Nuclear, Inc., Shangdong&#160;Nuclear&#160;Power&#160;Co.&#160;Ltd. (China), Siemens&#160;AG (Germany), State&#160;Nuclear&#160;Power&#160;Automation&#160;System&#160;Engineering&#160;Company (China), Savannah River Nuclear Solutions, LLC, Tennessee Valley Authority, US Department of Energy, and Westinghouse&#160;Electric Co.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Hydrocarbon and chemical process customers include numerous large oil refineries and chemical plants such as BP (worldwide), Statoil ASA (Norway), Chevron, Emerson Process Management, Shell&#160;Oil&#160;Company (worldwide), Savannah River Nuclear Solutions, LLC, and Total (Belgium).
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The following customer has provided more than 10% of the Company's consolidated revenue in 2015:

<A NAME="eolPage13"></A>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Marketing and Sales
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We market our products and services through a network of direct sales staff, agents and representatives, and strategic alliance partners.&#160; Market-oriented business and customer account teams define and implement specific campaigns to pursue opportunities.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In 2015 we launched a new website with improved navigation, a modern look and feel, and responsiveness to whatever type of device the viewer is using.&#160; We continue to have a proactive public relations program, issuing more non-financial press releases aimed at product development and delivery, as well as our role in numerous industry trade shows and technical conferences.&#160; We are active across numerous social media platforms to build a stronger presence across all media our clients use to find information about the Company, and providing useful information for each stage of the client's journey with the Company.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company's ability to support its multi-facility, international and/or multinational clients is facilitated by its network of offices and strategic partners in the U.S. and overseas.&#160; In addition to the offices located overseas, the Company's ability to conduct international business is enhanced by its multilingual and multicultural workforce.&#160; GSE has strategic relationships with system integrators and agents representing its interests in Bulgaria, Japan, Malaysia, Mexico, Singapore, South America, South Korea, Taiwan, Ukraine and various locations in the Gulf Coast Countries of the Middle East.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Competition
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Performance Improvement Solutions business encounters intense competition.&#160; In the nuclear simulation market, GSE competes directly with firms primarily from Canada, France and the U.S., such as L-3 MAPPS Inc., a subsidiary of L-3&#160;Communications (Canada), CORYS T.E.S.S (France) and Western&#160;Services Corporation.&#160; In the fossil simulation market, the Company competes with smaller companies in the U.S. and overseas.&#160; In the process industries the main competition comes from large Digital Control System/Automation companies such as Honeywell and Schneider.&#160; Competition for generalized engineering services, particularly those served from our office in the U.K., tend to be very locally oriented.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Nuclear Industry Training and Consulting business services include training related products and services as well as staff augmentation solutions.&#160; The competition for training related services includes:&#160; GP Strategies, The Westwind Group, Professional Training Technologies, and Western Technical Services.&#160; The competition for staff augmentation includes:&#160; Absolute Consulting,&#160; CB&amp;I, Planet Forward, and The Westwind Group.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
	13
</DIV>

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage14"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Competitive Advantages
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	While there is competition in various industry niches, there are few companies in our space that can combine the engineering, simulation and training expertise we now have through the execution of our acquisition strategy.&#160; None of our traditional competitors serve the broader performance improvement market and few work across the broader energy markets of Nuclear and Fossil power plus Petrochemicals.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="157BFA0801AD48F8B5B82A69A5C49E0D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	Unique Combination of Talent.&#160;
</FONT>
	Nobody in our market space brings together the sophistication of simulation technology with the engineering expertise, training expertise and visualization expertise to provide the holistic people and plant performance improvement solutions as well as we do.
</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="C0B430C37AF145789EFC3175AC1ECEB0" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 58.3PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 40.3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Industry Expertise
</FONT>
	.&#160; GSE is a leading innovator and developer of real-time software with more than 40 years of experience producing high-fidelity, real-time simulators.&#160; As a result, the Company has acquired substantial applications expertise in the energy and industrial process industries.&#160; The Company employs a highly educated and experienced multinational workforce of over 260 employees, including approximately 140 engineers and scientists in fields such as chemical, mechanical and electrical engineering, applied mathematics and computer sciences, and approximately 70 instructors and plant operations staff specialists.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="268489C0EC70418B9872D3E48D1B7B12" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 58.3PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 40.3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Proprietary Software Tools
</FONT>
	.&#160; GSE has developed a library of proprietary software tools including auto-code generators and system models that substantially facilitate and expedite the design, production and integration, testing and modification of software and systems.&#160; These tools are used to automatically generate the computer code and systems models required for specific functions commonly used in simulation applications, thereby enabling it or its customers to develop high-fidelity, real-time software quickly, accurately and at lower costs.&#160; The Company also has an expertise in being able to integrate 3
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	rd
</SUP>
	party engineering codes into the Company's simulation environment, thereby being able to offer some of the most sophisticated technical solutions in the market.&#160; The Company has a substantial library of Process-Specific Simulation models and eLearning Modules aimed at the oil and gas, refining and specialty chemicals market.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="D64A3A7AF0204F7FBAA368669C345AAE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 58.3PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 40.3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Training Curricula
</FONT>
	.&#160;&#160; The Company has developed hundreds of detailed courses and simulator exercise&#160;material and&#160;specific industrial applications including oil and gas refining, gas-oil production, nuclear and combined cycle gas turbine power plant and desalination.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="83BDF4977C5942DFBA22B26209A3870F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 58.3PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 40.3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Our Nuclear Industry Training and Consulting business is mostly focused on training and operations support.&#160; Our trainers and consultants provide their services at the customer facilities which allows us to interface with our customers directly in the course of doing business versus having to periodically call on customers.&#160; Our proximity allows us a significant competitive advantage in that we can immediately offer solutions and therefore bypass lengthy bid processes.
</DIV>
</TD>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Intellectual Property.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company depends upon its intellectual property rights in its proprietary technology and information.&#160; GSE maintains a portfolio of trademarks (both registered and unregistered), copyrights (both registered and unregistered), and licenses.&#160; While such trademarks, copyrights and licenses as a group are of material importance to the Company, it does not consider any one trademark, copyright, or license to be of such importance that the loss or expiration thereof would materially affect the Company.&#160;&#160; The Company relies upon a combination of trade secrets, copyright, and trademark law, contractual arrangements and technical means to protect its intellectual property rights.&#160; GSE distributes its software products under software license agreements that grant customers nonexclusive licenses for the use of its products, which are nontransferable.&#160; Use of the licensed software is restricted to designated computers at specified sites, unless the customer obtains a site license of its use of the software.&#160; Software and hardware security measures are also employed to prevent unauthorized use of the Company's software, and the licensed software is subject to terms and conditions prohibiting unauthorized reproduction of the software.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company does not own any patents.&#160; The Company believes that all of the Company's trademarks (especially those that use the phrase "GSE Systems") are valid and will have an unlimited duration as long as they are adequately protected and sufficiently used.&#160; The Company's licenses are perpetual in nature and will have an unlimited duration as long as they are adequately protected and the parties adhere to the material terms and conditions.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	GSE has numerous registered U.S. trademarks: GSE Systems&#174;, JTOPMERET&#174;, RELAP5-HD&#174;,&#160; TOTALVISION&#174;, VPanel&#174; and SimExec&#174;.&#160; Some of these trademarks have also been registered in foreign countries.&#160; The Company also claims trademark rights to DesignEP&#8482;, Java Application and Development Environment (JADE)&#8482;, OpenSim&#8482;, PSA-HD&#8482;, RACS&#8482;, SimSuite Pro&#8482;, SmartTutor&#8482;, THOR&#8482;, and Xtreme I/S&#8482;.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In addition, the Company maintains federal statutory copyright protection with respect to its software programs and products, has registered copyrights for some of the documentation and manuals related to these programs, and maintains trade secret protection on its software products.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Despite these protections, the Company cannot be sure that it has protected or will be able to protect its intellectual property adequately, that the unauthorized disclosure or use of its intellectual property will be prevented, that others have not or will not develop similar technology independently, or, to the extent it owns any patents in the future, that others have not or will not be able to design around those patents.&#160;&#160; Furthermore, the laws of certain countries in which the Company's products are sold do not protect its products and intellectual property rights to the same extent as the laws of the United States.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
	15

<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company does not reflect an order in backlog until it has received a contract or purchase order that specifies the terms and milestone delivery dates or other payment terms.&#160; As of December&#160;31,&#160;2015, the Company's aggregate contract backlog totaled approximately $47.9&#160;million of which approximately $30.2&#160;million or 63.0% is expected to be converted to revenue by December&#160;31,&#160;2016.&#160; As of December&#160;31,&#160;2014, the Company's aggregate contract backlog totaled approximately $49.7&#160;million.
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The following are some of the factors that we believe could cause our actual results to differ materially from historical results and from the results contemplated by the forward-looking statements contained in this report and other public statements made by us.&#160; Additional risks and uncertainties not presently known to us, or that we currently see as immaterial, may also harm our business.&#160; Most of these risks are generally beyond our control.&#160; If any of the risks or uncertainties described below, or any such other or additional risks and uncertainties actually occurs, our business, results of operations and financial condition could be materially and adversely affected.&#160; The following information should be read in conjunction with Item&#160;7&#160;-&#160;Management's&#160;Discussion&#160;and&#160;Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations and the consolidated financial statements and related notes under Item&#160;8&#160;-&#160;Financial Statements and Supplementary Data.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Our business is largely dependent on sales to the nuclear power industry.&#160; Any disruption in this industry would have a material adverse effect upon our revenue and profitability.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In 2015, 71% of our revenue was from customers in the nuclear power industry (61% in 2014).&#160; We expect to derive a significant portion of our revenue from customers in the nuclear power industry for the foreseeable future.&#160; Our ability to supply nuclear power plant simulators and related products and services is dependent on the continued operation of nuclear power plants and, to a lesser extent, on the construction of new nuclear power plants.&#160; A wide range of factors affect the continued operation and construction of nuclear power plants, including the political and regulatory environment, the availability and cost of alternative means of power generation, the occurrence of future nuclear incidents, such as the one which occurred at the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant in 2011, and general economic conditions.&#160; In addition, demand for our products and services may be affected by changes in the legal and regulatory environment within which the global nuclear power industry operates.&#160; Regulatory changes could materially affect demand for our products, the profitability of our service deliveries to nuclear power industry customers, and the overall efficacy of our current business model.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
	17
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage18"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Our sales to foreign customers expose us to risks associated with operating internationally.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Sales of products and services to end users outside the United States accounted for approximately 31% of the Company's consolidated revenue in 2015 and 52% of consolidated revenue in 2014.&#160; Consequently, our businesses are subject to a variety of risks that are specific to international operations, including the following:
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

</TR>
